nodes.text: Carilla's Catering and Wedding Planning was a wedding-planning shop located in the city Hedrett on the planet Cularin, which was operated by the Human Carilla during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. Circa 31 BBY, the Heroes of Cularin—a group of freelance agents who operated in the Cularin system—traveled to Carilla's shop while investigating a plot to disrupt the wedding of Senator Lavina Wren.
